summary: This is my guide to playing on a low end pc or laptop. I originally made mods on a 4 GB intel graphics netbook and I have recently upgraded to a 8 GB intel graphics laptop and performance is better.
descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][b]Needed mods for performance first:
[/b][/size][/font][/i]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79323]Performance Package - PP[/url]﻿ I used this on vanilla Skyrim and I instantly gained 20 fps! Now you can do the same. (you can merge the plugins) This includes the SKSE. ini so you don't have to download it. 
(mods included in this are as follows: 
[/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51038/?][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]SKSE ini pre-download for lazy users by Sagittarius22[/size][/font][/url]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61732/?]Smoke and Dust Remover by Xoninho[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/736/?]Interior and Dungeon Fog Remover by 747823[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58156/?]Platoon Performance Mods by Platoon[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75655/?]Darkerrim No Lighting by thelawfull[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37655/?]Skyrip by rmmuk[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74156/?]RemoveTrees-RemoverArvores by Darkmano[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4528/?]Possessive Corpses no more lazy zombies and shy nirnroots by Amgepo[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61680/?]No More Blinding Fog by WankingSkeever[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56112/?]Remove the little rocks by Griffin[/url][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53692/?]Low Res Particles and Flora - LRPF by nirnhogg AKA slamm98[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56545/?]Subtle Cloak Spell Graphics by Jaxonz[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26873/?]Sunhallowed arrow effect lag fix by wyvern236[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75345/?]Beauty Of Fps Project by thelawfull[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6566/?]Shaders Begone - NoGlow by Duns_Inc[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83368/?]Icefloes BeGone by Boerakis[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59894/?]No Snowflakes in Sovngarde by Lyss[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76684/?]Tree Mesh Remover by URANIMATIX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29985/?]Winterhold Delete Snow Patches by Argonite21
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79559/?]Unofficial Skyrim City Patch (USCP) by DDVIL[/url])[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78464]PerformanceHitRelief Remastered - PHR_PE[/url]﻿ Does pretty much the same thing except it includes the leaves falling removal. You can also get that as a seperate file if you don't want this one.
(- Less lag, more performance.
- Makes cloud smaller and less detailed.
- Removes dust particles.
- Remove Interior and Exterior fog.
- Remove Field & Dungeon Smoke.
[color=#f1f1f1]- Remove Field & Dungeon Mist.[/color]
[color=#f1f1f1]- [/color]Remove GRASS! INCOMPATIBLE WITH FLORA MODS.
[color=#f1f1f1]- Remove uninterpretable vegetation! [/color]INCOMPATIBLE WITH FLORA MODS.
[color=#f1f1f1]- Remove CPU-hogging trees and replace them with younger, less detailed ones (less CPU-Strain).[/color]
[color=#f1f1f1]- Remove wood pile, vines and drift wood.[/color]
[color=#f1f1f1]- Works with Vanilla and Legendary Edition.[/color]
[color=#f1f1f1]- Cleaned of ITMs and UDRs using [/color]TES5Edit.
[color=#f1f1f1]- Scripted NMM and MO installer.[/color]
[color=#f1f1f1]- All components optional.)[/color]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6387]Skyrim Performance Plus
[/url][/size][/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63621][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Performance Hit Relief
[/size][/font][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42360]Bethesda Performance Textures - Armors - Clothes - Weapons[/url]﻿
[/size][/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43921][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Bethesda Performance Textures - Animals - Creatures
[/size][/font][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58666]One Mountain - To rule them all[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77791]No more radial blur - performance optimization[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73746]Cities and villages 512 performance edition[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70112]Bits and Bobs 512 [/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69922]Caves and Mines 512 special performance edition[/url]﻿
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69682]New Ship 512 special performance edition[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?]Skyrim Project Optimization[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79995/?]Whiterun Texture Memory Usage Reduction[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16464/]Shadow Remover[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84407/]Ugly Bronze Shine Remover [/url]﻿included in most skin packages these days. 
[url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/12rVnL1thdtS4_846xUOBbpo5KPHo-oBs/view]Massive Master's Potato Landscape Pack[/url]﻿ super super low end pc. is 64 by 64.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33582/?tab=files]Grass on Steroids[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85334]Veydosebrom - Grasses and Groundcover[/url]

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]Performance Enbs:
[/size]
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15425]Stakado Cinemascope ENB [/url]﻿
[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53083]PerformanceXP ENB[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66465]Dreamer - Real Performance ENB[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59842]PV-Performance ENB[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81808]Hecate ENB[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82504]Calipso ENB[/url]

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Can't run an ENB? Not to worry, try out  I Can't Believe It's Not An ENB. Or try out some sweetfx presets or fxaa injector. 

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/]Imaginator[/url]

Gimp. Heard that Ordenator and DDSOPT isn't the best.
Use to optimize your textures to as much as possible. Leave skin textures at 2k.
[/size][/font]
author: taoxue
